Package io.streamthoughts.azkarra.api.components

Interface GettableComponent<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the component-type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    public interface GettableComponent<T>
extends AutoCloseable
    Class for getting a configurable component.
